info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:59PM CDT until July 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... Kane County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Genoa to Waterman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aurora, Elgin, DeKalb, Bartlett, Carpentersville, St. Charles, Algonquin, West Chicago, Batavia, Huntley, Geneva, Sycamore, Campton Hills, Genoa, South Elgin, Montgomery, North Aurora, Sugar Grove, Pingree Grove and Gilberts. Including the following interstates... I-88 between mile markers 91 and 120. I-90 between mile markers 42 and 56. This includes... Northern Illinois University, Aurora University, Elgin Community College, Fermilab, IL Math and Science Academy, Kane County Cougars Ballpark, and Waubonsee Community College. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
